objects.description: Monitor for API calls (such as GetAdaptersInfo() and GetIpNetTable()) that may gather details about the network configuration and settings, such as IP and/or MAC addresses. Also monitor for API calls that may attempt to get a listing of network connections to or from the compromised system they are currently accessing or from remote systems by querying for information over the network. For added context on adversary procedures and background see [System Network Configuration Discovery Mitigation](https://attack.mitre.org/mitigations/T1016) and [System Network Connections Discovery Mitigation](https://attack.mitre.org/mitigations/T1049).
